To quit ShowyEdge, choose “Quit ShowyEdge” from menu bar.
Note If you’ve hidden the menu bar icon, you can also quit ShowyEdge from Settings.
Open Settings. Press Quit ShowyEdge button.

Basic You can change the indicator height.
Open Settings. Choose Indicator from the sidebar. Adjust height. Advanced You can put the indicator by custom size and origin.
Open Settings. Choose Custom Frame from the sidebar. Enable Use custom frame, and then adjust the indicator size and origin. Tips You can specify size by pixel or percentage of screen. (e.g., width = 100%, height = 20pt) Choose Lower-Left from origin options if you want to put indicator to the bottom of screen.
